lyrics:
"Whippin'" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Whippin'" Standin' over the stove, yeah that chicken pot Playa hatin' spreading like the chickenpox Smoke so much, you'd think I have dreadlocks And I'ma start back robbin' if the bread stop I get you killed on the inside green dot I'll make your plug rob you, whole house be cleaned out Ain't no real niggas in the club unless my team out Magazine in my jeans and I don't like to read All my niggas love to eat, I got sharks to feed I hustle 8 days out the week, you're not no boss to me I tote the rock like Barry Sanders, I never dropped a key And I'ma cook it for you for free but I usually charge a fee Whippin', whippin', whippin', whippin', whippin', whippin', whippin' Woke up in the kitchen and I started mad whippin' Woke up in the dam with a 100 bad bitches Woke up in the kitchen and I started mad whippin' Whippin', whippin', whippin', whippin', whippin' Woke up in the kitchen and I started mad whippin' Woke up in the dam with a 100 bad bitches Screamin' "money over bitches" and I started mad whippin' Whippin' Whip! All my dope is whippable All my bricks are flippable, so extra grams are tippable My living room the chicken room, my bedroom is the treasury I'm whippin dope excessively, I pick my trap selectively He peekin' in the kitchen, so I feel he disrespectin' me I'm pushin' man, but sellin' dope has always been my legacy Seven apartments, double my garment, all the junkies beggin' me Pills and pints and ecstasy, I need a secretarity Damn, I said it wrong, but fuck it, I'm a celebrity I'm re-rockin' squares, a hundred thousand profit regularly So let me get this straight, I'm tryna hear this shit you tellin' me You can't price this dope I'm sellin' unless you dumb niggas that's mailin' me Whippin', whippin', whippin', whippin', whippin', whippin', whippin' Woke up in the kitchen and I started mad whippin' Woke up in the dam with a 100 bad bitches Woke up in the kitchen and I started mad whippin' Whippin', whippin', whippin', whippin', whippin' Woke up in the kitchen and I started mad whippin' Woke up in the dam with a 100 bad bitches Screamin' "money over bitches" and I started mad whippin' Whippin' if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
